mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISHLIST WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND USER_NO =#{userNo}
SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO as productNo, p.PRODUCT_TITLE as productTitle, p.PRODUCT_ADULT_PRICE as productAdultPrice FROM WISHLIST w, PRODUCT p WHERE w.PRODUCT_NO = p.PRODUCT_NO AND w.USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM WISHLIST WHERE PRODUCT_NO =#{productNo} AND USER_NO =#{userNo}
